description.bike: High-performance batteries for motorcycles and scooters
description.upsInverter: Reliable power backup solutions for home and office

hero.title: A TO Z BATTERY
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner for Premium Exide Batteries
hero.description: We are an authorized dealer of EXIDE BATTERY, offering genuine products with warranty and excellent customer service. Choose from our wide range of high-quality batteries for all your needs.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Control your language, theme and security preferences.

language.title: Language

language.note: We store your choice only on this device (localStorage).

theme.description: Switch between light and dark mode for the whole app.

notifications.description: Control how we send you important updates.

security.passwordMinLength: New password must be at least 8 characters long.
